column5: My Dad (Mistyriver1) and I were dying to get fishing and since there is no ice   we decided to go try some Simcoe dock fishing, our first bit of fishing for 2007.  We got there around 11:00 and the fish weren't cooperating but when they started, they didn't stop...  Here are a few pictures from the day...  I started the day off with this nice Simcoe perch    A few more..      Then my dad switched to the same bait that I was using and he had success..    The jiggin raps were working really good for us today...      The day went by VERY fast!!!  But time flies when you are having fun We ended up getting 27 nice perch (all released to swim another day  ) No PB's or huge fish, but it was sure good to wet a line.  Thanks for reading. I hope you enjoyed.  Mistyjr1

good report buddy! we were down there today to too. the fish were biting better today then yesterday. we also caught 7 perch over 9inches, and 2 over 10 that we kept. and released many more. edit- after looking closer at your pics, we seemed to be on the same dock at one point lol.
Good report and pics. I bet it's far better then the other option of being in School like next week. Good way to fill in the day. Thanks for the report.
Looks like you had a good time, nice report.
Good to see you and your Pop enjoying this  weather Corey, and getting a bunch of decent fish to boot.
A great report to start out the year Corey!
hey way to go guys,sometimes its not how many you get to bring home,but its called quality time together ,great report and pics
Nice job mistyjr.  Thanks for the report.  Looks like it was a great day out there too.
nice perch man! ive been getting into some near me there always fun when nothing else is bitting! mmm and they taste good
Cool, glad you had a chance to get out and catch some fish!  Mike
Hey great stuff.  Nice to get out there, in the sunshine, and get some nibbles.  Great report  Joey
Alrighty now    Good to see ya out with your dad catching some fish and have a good time!  Thanks for sharing Corey!    Whopper
all this open water is crazy!! nice report, I am heading out tomorrow as well!
